title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the first column name should use the alias name instead of the original name. After double-clicking the original name, the alias name should appear as row["column1"] in the expression builder. This is the expected behavior according to scr 78193.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double-click the first column name in the expression builder.

Expected behavior:
The first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name.
Actual behavior:
The original name of the first column is listed below the expression builder, but the alias name appears as row["column1"] above it after double-clicking the original name.
